Everything is good except that we immigrant students are not treated very fairly. Many Lincoln Park athletes are immigrant students but people mainly cheer for those local students. This make me wonder whether I want to fully devote myself to the team.
I agree with this as an immigrant student myself.
Good morning, neighbors! Anyone up for a jog before work?
It's heartwarming to see our community's kids grow and excel. Sports day was a testament to that.
Does anyone have a ladder I can borrow? Need to clean my gutters.
Watch out for icy sidewalks, folks. Just took a nasty fall on my way home.
Let's make sure we keep the park clean after events, it's our community treasure.
